TopicTitle: [1.1.2] KSPRC - Renaissance Compilation: artworks remake [V-0.7 Pre Release 3]

Articles.Content:
3 hours ago, Son_of_Flynn said:

All work with it!. I merged my fav parts from SVE and KSPRC together so I get the best clouds with the best textures (my opinion).

Would love to try your mix, wanna share ;-)

I just had alook at the seprate in gamedata olders, and TBH don't know where to start....

On 6/8/2016 at 8:39 AM, Silent1_87 said:

for peoples who asking me how i add SVE Clouds. this is super Easy as nansuchao Explain it for me First u delete Clouds file as i show u here in this screenshot.  its in Ksprc/atmosphers folder in game data.

Then add Only StockVisualEnhancements Folder To ur Game data. u dont need the other two. so Esay

Remember This method will replace all Planet Clouds with SVE including Eve jool Duna and lyethe. But Personally i prefer SVE until Proot complete his work.  

@FizzerUK This is the method i used. I like the SVE clouds better.

35 minutes ago, Son_of_Flynn said:

@FizzerUK This is the method i used. I like the SVE clouds better.

How are the SVE Duna clouds? KSPRC Duna clouds/dust storms are epic.

 

Edited June 23, 2016 by Waz

57 minutes ago, Son_of_Flynn said:

@FizzerUK This is the method i used. I like the SVE clouds better.

 

Me also, so looked at it all but was unsure which I am replacing, Thanks for the quick howto.

Hope ya don't mind the dissussion @Proot Your mod is still awsome and glad you have updated for 1.1.2.

A cup of coffee on the way

47 minutes ago, Waz said:

How are the SVE Duna clouds? KSPRC Duna clouds/dust storms are epic.

 

Not bad, but im sure there is a way to keep the KSPRC config for Duna.

44 minutes ago, Son_of_Flynn said:

Not bad, but im sure there is a way to keep the KSPRC config for Duna.

Yes, there is a way, but you have to look and change some config file. You have to look at the textures used in KSPRC for Duna's clouds, copy them in a new folder in GameData, find the Duna's config in the KSPRC clouds.cfg and replace the config for Duna in the SVE clouds.cfg but changing the place to find the texture. It's tricky, but it can be done.

Edited June 23, 2016 by Nansuchao
We have to restart the sun its our only hope.
When I use SVE with KSPRC the clouds are either too blocky(UR version), or they are not the SVE clouds but EVE clouds from ground view. Is anyone else having similar problems?

1 hour ago, Notsure_jr said:

When I use SVE with KSPRC the clouds are either too blocky(UR version), or they are not the SVE clouds but EVE clouds from ground view. Is anyone else having similar problems?

How can you have the default Eve clouds if you have not the BoulderCo folder in your GameData?

22 minutes ago, Nansuchao said:

How can you have the default Eve clouds if you have not the BoulderCo folder in your GameData?

That's what I want to know.

1 hour ago, Notsure_jr said:

That's what I want to know.

Can you upload some pics? And a copy of your clouds.cfg please.
